View Source   Improve this doc

Dialogs

A native dialogs system. Native dialogs can give you a bit more control over the UI than the browser built-ins, though the Dialogs plugin will fall back to the built-ins when necessary.

Dialogs class

exported from ionic/ionic
defined in ionic/native/dialogs/dialogs.ts (line 4)

A native dialogs system. Native dialogs can give you a bit more control over the UI than the browser built-ins, though the Dialogs plugin will fall back to the built-ins when necessary.
